body_content.explanation: something that has been cut in half so that you can see the inside, or a model or picture of this:
examples: a cross-section of the human heart
Embedded in the stone was a perfect cross section of a fossilized shell.
The picture shows concentric rings, resembling the rings of a tree in cross-section.

body_content.explanation: a group that represents most or all of the different types within a larger total group:
examples: The demonstrators seemed to be from a wide cross-section of society.
Do you think the participants represent a fair cross-section of opinion?
The people involved in the project were an interesting cross-section.
